meanings.definition: The act of riding or performing tricks on a skateboard.
meanings.sent1: Skateboardings can be thrilling when you glide down a ramp.
meanings.sent2: He enjoys watching professional skateboardings competitions.
meanings.sent3: After many falls, he finally mastered the art of skateboardings.
meanings.sent4: Her skateboardings skills soared to new heights after hours of practice.
meanings.sent5: The essence of skateboardings is the freedom to express oneself through movement.

meanings.definition: The sport or activity of riding a skateboard.
meanings.sent2: They organized a local skateboardings event in the park.
meanings.sent3: In the world of skateboardings, he was known for his daring stunts.
meanings.sent4: To him, skateboardings was more than just a hobby; it was a way of life.
meanings.sent5: The community center offers classes for beginners interested in skateboardings.

meanings.definition: The practice or hobby of using a skateboard.
meanings.sent1: His love for skateboardings began when he was just a child.
meanings.sent2: Skateboardings enthusiasts often gather at the skate park on weekends.
meanings.sent3: She found solace in the simplicity of skateboardings after a long day.
meanings.sent4: The city council approved the construction of a new skateboardings facility.
meanings.sent5: The sound of skateboardings wheels rolling on the pavement echoed through the neighborhood.
